魮魮魮

魮字的基本解释

魮
pí
鳑鲏鱼。

魮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pí］
［《廣韻》房脂切，平脂，並。］
(1)今瓣鳃纲中能产珍珠的珠母贝。古或称“魮”、“文魮”。
(2)鳑鲏鱼。参见“鰟魮”。
[②]［bǐ］
［《集韻》補履切，上旨，幫。］
鱼名。

魮字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　魮； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1466第22
【唐韻】房脂切【集韻】【韻會】頻脂切，?音毗。【說文】文魮，魚名。【山海經】濫水西流注于漢水，多?魮之魚，狀如覆銚，鳥首而魚翼魚尾，音如磐石之聲。【郭璞·江賦】文魮磬鳴以孕璆。【?篇】或作?。又【集韻】補履切，音彼。魚名。尾有毒。

魮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
魮字的起名意思

暂无。

Horror
Basic explanation of words
Horror
pí
Tortoises.
Horror
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pí］
["Guangyun" Fangzhi cut, flat fat, and. ]
(1) The pearl-producing pearl oysters in the current branchial branch. In ancient times, it was also called "魮" and "Wen魮".
(2) Tortoises. See "魮魮".
[②]［bǐ］
["Ji Yun" to make up and cut, decree, help. ]
The name of the fish.
Horror
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　魮; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1466 22
【Tang Yun】Fang Zhiqie 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme】Frequent fat cut, sound and admiration. [Said Wen] Wen Yi, the name of a fish. [Shan Hai Jing] Overflowing water flows westward in Han River, and there are many fishes like scorpions, with bird heads and fish wings and tails, sound like the sound of a rock. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Wen Jingming Ming to give birth to pregnancy. [?] Or make?. Also 【Jiyun】make up the shoe and cut it, sound the other. The name of the fish. The tail is poisonous.
